mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUPYO(TUPY_SEQ, TUPY_CLAS_ID, TUPY_TOTAL_USER, TUPY_STARTDATE, TUPY_ENDDATE, TUPY_STATUS) VALUES(TUPY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{tupyClasId}, #{tupyTotalUser}, CURRENT_DATE , #{tupyEnddate}, 'P')
mapper.select: SELECT TUOP_SEQ ,TUOP_TUPY_SEQ ,TUOP_INSTR ,TUOP_FEE FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_TUPY_SEQ =( SELECT TUOP_TUPY_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_SEQ =#{tuopTupySeq} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUPYO_OPTION(TUOP_SEQ, TUOP_TUPY_SEQ, TUOP_INSTR, TUOP_FEE) VALUES(TUOP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tuopTupySeq}, #{tuopInstr}, #{tuopFee})
INSERT INTO TUPYO_USER(TUUS_SEQ, TUUS_OPTION_SEQ, TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID, TUUS_AGREE) VALUES(TUUS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tuusOptionSeq}, #{tuusAccountId}, 'A')
mapper.select: SELECT TUUS_OPTION_SEQ, COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM TUPYO_USER tu WHERE TUUS_OPTION_SEQ IN ( SELECT TUOP_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_TUPY_SEQ =( SELECT TUOP_TUPY_SEQ FROM TUPYO_OPTION to2 WHERE TUOP_SEQ =#{tuopTupySeq} ) ) GROUP BY TUUS_OPTION_SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TUPYO_USER tu WHERE TUUS_ACCOUNT_ID =#{tuusAccountId} AND TUUS_OPTION_SEQ =#{tuusOptionSeq}
